abstract: Shells hit the Sana International Airport in Sana, Yemen, but there is no apparent major damage or casualties; this is first direct attack made at strategically important airport since fighting broke out in the Yemeni capital, which may indicate possible move by opposition forces to escalate conflict with the government.
snippet: For the first time since fighting broke out in the Yemeni capital, Sana International Airport came under direct attack.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: For the first time since fighting broke out in the Yemeni capital, Sana International Airport came under direct attack.

headline.main: Airport in Yemen Is Hit by Shells as Attacks in the Capital Widen
headline.print_headline: Airport in Yemen Is Hit by Shells As Attacks in the Capital Widen
headline.seo: Sana, Yemen, Airport Is Hit by Shells
